comments:
Seen this one before?
Also the Ant outline window was very slow, flashing, moving the highlight
around, and locking the UI for several seconds at a time.
Mylar for Eclipse 3.2 0.3.9.1

I didn't notice anything wierd about the file. It was called build.xml, and had
no errors. Unclicking the Mylar glasses on the outline view helped some but I
still noticed lots of refreshing of the outline view (probably because of Mylar
decorations).

Ed, if the file is not confidential could you attach it to the report?  I can
guard around this failure but would like to replicate the bug.  You could also
send it to mylar@cs.ubc.ca if you don't want to attach it, but no problem if you
aren't able to do that.
Fixed by guarding against Ant elements that fail to resolve.

This turned out to be a considerably deeper problem with the way that we get the Ant model,
and the way that we eagerly try to update the Outline.  the update is now considerably
more lazy and the performance should be a non-issue whether the Mylar glasses are on or
off.  Please let me know if that's not the case.
